title: E-Commerce Platform
summary: Full-stack Django e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.
description_md:
# E-Commerce Platform

A comprehensive e-commerce solution built with Django and modern web technologies.

## Features

- **User Authentication**: Registration, login, password recovery
- **Product Catalog**: Categories, search, filtering
- **Shopping Cart**: Add/remove items, quantity management
- **Payment Processing**: Stripe integration for secure payments
- **Order Management**: Order tracking, email notifications
- **Admin Dashboard**: Inventory management, sales analytics

## Tech Stack

- **Backend**: Django, Django REST Framework
- **Frontend**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
- **Payment**: Stripe API
- **Deployment**: AWS EC2, Nginx, Gunicorn

## Challenges Solved

This project tackled complex e-commerce challenges including inventory synchronization, secure payment processing, and scalable architecture design.

title: Task Management API
summary: RESTful API for team collaboration with real-time updates, file attachments, and project analytics.
description_md:
# Task Management API

A robust REST API built with Django REST Framework for modern team collaboration.

## Key Features

- **Project Management**: Create and organize projects
- **Task Tracking**: Assign, prioritize, and track tasks
- **Real-time Updates**: WebSocket integration for live updates
- **File Attachments**: Secure file upload and management
- **Team Collaboration**: User roles and permissions
- **Analytics**: Project progress and team performance metrics

## API Endpoints

- `/api/projects/` - Project CRUD operations
- `/api/tasks/` - Task management
- `/api/users/` - User management
- `/api/analytics/` - Project analytics

Built with scalability and performance in mind.

title: Weather Dashboard
summary: Interactive weather application with location-based forecasts, charts, and weather alerts.
description_md:
# Weather Dashboard

An interactive weather application providing comprehensive weather information and forecasts.

## Features

- **Current Weather**: Real-time weather conditions
- **5-Day Forecast**: Detailed weather predictions
- **Interactive Maps**: Weather overlays and satellite imagery
- **Location Search**: Find weather for any city worldwide
- **Weather Alerts**: Severe weather notifications
- **Historical Data**: Past weather trends and comparisons

## Data Sources

Integrates with multiple weather APIs for accurate and reliable data.

title: Blog CMS
summary: Content management system with markdown editor, SEO optimization, and social media integration.
description_md:
# Blog CMS

A modern content management system built for bloggers and content creators.

## Features

- **Markdown Editor**: Rich text editing with live preview
- **SEO Optimization**: Meta tags, sitemaps, structured data
- **Media Management**: Image upload with automatic optimization
- **Social Integration**: Auto-posting to social media platforms
- **Analytics**: Built-in traffic and engagement analytics
- **Multi-user**: Role-based access control

Perfect for personal blogs or team content creation.

title: Portfolio Website
summary: This very website! Modern portfolio with AJAX interactions, dark mode, and responsive design.
description_md:
# Portfolio Website

The website you're currently viewing! Built as a showcase of modern web development practices.

## Highlights

- **Modern Design**: Neumorphic design with glassmorphism elements
- **Performance**: 90+ Lighthouse scores across all metrics
- **Accessibility**: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant
- **Dark Mode**: System preference detection with manual toggle
- **AJAX Interactions**: Smooth, app-like experience
- **SEO Optimized**: Proper meta tags and structured data

## Technical Implementation

Built with Django and Tailwind CSS, featuring advanced CSS animations and JavaScript interactions.

title: Recipe Finder
summary: Discover recipes based on available ingredients with nutritional information and cooking instructions.
description_md:
# Recipe Finder

Find delicious recipes based on ingredients you have at home.

## Features

- **Ingredient-based Search**: Find recipes using available ingredients
- **Nutritional Information**: Calories, macros, and dietary information
- **Step-by-step Instructions**: Clear cooking instructions
- **Save Favorites**: Bookmark your favorite recipes
- **Shopping Lists**: Generate ingredient shopping lists

Great for meal planning and reducing food waste!
